about_the_game:
Around Elves!

A token pack filled with elven units!
This product includes:
  • Elven_Dark_Enchantress[elf,dark,caster]
  • Elven_Dark_Knight[elf,dark,fighter]
  • Elven_Dark_Mistress[elf,dark,cleric]
  • Elven_Dark_Sneak[elf,dark,rogue]
  • Elven_F_Alchemist[elf,alchemist,female]
  • Elven_F_Blademaster[elf,fighter,knight]
  • Elven_F_Cleric[elf,Cleric,female]
  • Elven_F_Lancer[elf,fighter,cavalier]
  • Elven_F_Monk[elf,monk,female]
  • Elven_F_Shaman[elf,druid,shaman]
  • Elven_F_Sneak[elf,rogue,sneak]
  • Elven_F_Spellblade[elf,magus,Wizard]
  • Elven_F_Spellcaster[elf,sorcerer,wizard]
  • Elven_M_Alchemist[elf,alchemist,male]
  • Elven_M_Blademaster[elf,fighter,knight]
  • Elven_M_Cleric[elf,Cleric,male]
  • Elven_M_Lancer[elf,fighter,cavalier]
  • Elven_M_Monk[elf,monk,male]
  • Elven_M_Shaman[elf,druid,shaman]
  • Elven_M_Sneak[elf,rogue,sneak]
  • Elven_M_Spellblade[elf,magus,Wizard]
  • Elven_M_Spellcaster[elf,sorcerer,wizard]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
detailed_description:
Around Elves!

A token pack filled with elven units!
This product includes:
  • Elven_Dark_Enchantress[elf,dark,caster]
  • Elven_Dark_Knight[elf,dark,fighter]
  • Elven_Dark_Mistress[elf,dark,cleric]
  • Elven_Dark_Sneak[elf,dark,rogue]
  • Elven_F_Alchemist[elf,alchemist,female]

  • Elven_F_Monk[elf,monk,female]
  • Elven_F_Shaman[elf,druid,shaman]
  • Elven_F_Sneak[elf,rogue,sneak]
  • Elven_F_Spellblade[elf,magus,Wizard]
  • Elven_F_Spellcaster[elf,sorcerer,wizard]
  • Elven_M_Alchemist[elf,alchemist,male]
  • Elven_M_Blademaster[elf,fighter,knight]
  • Elven_M_Cleric[elf,Cleric,male]
  • Elven_M_Lancer[elf,fighter,cavalier]
  • Elven_M_Monk[elf,monk,male]
  • Elven_M_Shaman[elf,druid,shaman]
  • Elven_M_Sneak[elf,rogue,sneak]
  • Elven_M_Spellblade[elf,magus,Wizard]
  • Elven_M_Spellcaster[elf,sorcerer,wizard]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Around Elves!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
